Chapter.Label: Chapter_Installation_automatically_generated_documentation_parts
Chapter.Heading: Installation
Chapter.Section:
How to install this package
This package can only be used on a system that has 4ti2 installed. For more information about this please visit http://www.4ti2.de. For installing this package, first make sure you have 4ti2 installed. Copy it in your GAP pkg-directory. After this, the package can be loaded via LoadPackage( "4ti2Interface" );
